    • About Kurt Duffeck


    Kurt Duffeck is not just a realtor, but a licensed Broker Associate with over 17 years of expertise in Real Estate Marketing, Sales, Negotiating and Investing. Kurt is the founder of Anew Real Estate Crew. The Anew Real Estate Crew is your one-stop-shop in the AUSTIN, TX Metro for all of your family’s real estate Buying & Selling needs. Through our local referral network we track both, listings “not yet on the market” and all Active & Sold MLS properties. Start with our state-of-the-art home search website and view all Austin, TX Metro Homes For Sale - search by neighborhood, zip, or map. - or request a free, no-obligation estimate of your home’s value. We’ve got all the local resources you’ll need for the planning of your family’s move - and on through the many years of home ownership. Start Right. Start ANEW!
